title: The Millionaires
overview: Five characters and the deadly sin of greed. A vicious cycle.

title: The Manifesto: The Globalist Agenda and You
overview: Determined to educate people about how the global elite are controlling the world, a lone man documents his war against the powers that be.
tagline: Wake up sheeple / You're a slave / They own you

title: I Am My Own
overview: Crime-drama about a drifting drug dealer on the run in the Swedish countryside, who ends up with a baby on his hands.
tagline: Thief, Liar, Drug Dealer, Surrogate Father

title: Border Patrol
overview: Carl and Franz are all ready to get off work and watch the big match against Austria when they make an unwelcome discovery. So, deal with it, or make it someone Else's problem?

title: Nego
overview: Small, black and skinny, another street boy obeying the crook known as Parana, even unprotected and alone, he walks for hours in the dangerous streets of a nightly Sao Paulo, to deliver a mysterious package. As he goes in his journey suffering cold, distresses, loneliness and fear, Nego takes refuge into his thoughts, pictures of his life.

title: Empire Gypsy
overview: In a Bronx dispatch the aspirations and misdeeds of cab drivers, call girls and low level thugs collide in one wild night.

title: I'll Kill You Even If I'm Dead
overview: Daniel is upset because his father left the largest part of his fortune to his brother Jaime, so he joins forces with Jaime's wife to kill him.

title: Drive & Seek
overview: Bank robbers, gangsters and fast cars: watch the exciting film for the new C-Class here or the interactive version at www.mercedes-benz.com/c-coupe. In classic action movie style the C-Class Coupé with all its technical sophistication is the star the show.

title: The Black Tape
overview: An intruder breaks into the home of an unsuspecting family in order to make a home made murder film.
tagline: Shot by Me, Cut by Me, Music by Me, Murder by Me, Now Watch Me

title: The Binding of Ishmael
overview: A young man questions the meaning of family duty when he is thrust into the violent rift between his father and brother.

title: The Broken Woman
overview: A seriously injured woman takes a rusty elevator from the ground floor to the sixth floor in an apartment building. She is bleeding and covered in glass. What has happened to her? Why is she there?

title: Sacred Whispers
overview: The story takes place in the 1940's and in the beginning of the 1960's. Thomas Smith had a religious upbringing! His mother being quite abusive, forbade him from pursuing his passions. This suppression, turned Thomas into a deprived individual resulting in his growing up a tormented soul, constantly fighting his demons, striving for salvation.

title: Saghaye Pooshali
overview: A young engineer and his wife are affected by an odd incident one night on the road.

title: Cruzadas
overview: Ernesto Pérez Roble is a tycoon, owner of a multimedia group, who when he dies leaves everything in the hands of his daughter Juana. But Camila Lamónica appears, his other daughter -unrecognized-, who owns a dancehall and wants half of her father's fortune.

title: Portico
overview: When small time Irish hood, Shawn Murphy, goes to work for Lawrence, Massachusetts Mafia boss Sonny Pentola, he soon finds he might have gotten more than he bargained for. Shawn quickly earns rank and Sonny's trust when he saves Sonny from an assassination attempt. Sonny makes him a trusted liaison in a large development deal with Irish associates in Boston.

title: The Great American Serial Killer
overview: In the early 1990s, Robert Kemp savagely raped, tortured, and murdered thirty-two people before being caught and sentenced to death. The Great American Serial Killer is the account of the final interview by Dr. Jeremiah Stone. Kemp's story, in his own words, lets us all see into the mind of the twisted and sadistic mind of a true psychopath.
tagline: Watch this film with caution, as you enter the mind of THE GREAT AMERICAN SERIAL KILLER!

title: The Tribute
overview: The film is of the action genre and deals with the already known phenomenon of tribute in Kosovo, robbery and financial blackmail.

title: O-Ring
overview: After hitting a man with his car in the middle of a snow-covered countryside, a young actor has to improvise to escape from punishment.

title: Nincet Ninety
overview: More than 89, less than 91.

title: Animal Within
overview: A hotel suite: the scenario for a young student to discover with his own eyes the dark venture of a wicked man. Give yourself up to the monster.

title: Mack
overview: An action comedy of two low level assassins assigned by their boss to aid the legendary killer Mack. Unfortunately for them, they start off their day late and everything goes downhill in a flurry of bodies and unlucky coincidences.

title: In Full Bloom
overview: A father searches for his missing son while the other inhabitants of his apartment complex turn the blame on him and on each other, tearing apart the community as their hidden prejudices surface.

title: Heels
overview: A serial killer with a foot fetish stalks his prey even as an unexpected danger closes in.

title: Rat Bait
overview: It tells the story of young people walking the long road of life. It shows how evil people in power, taking advantage of the small mistakes made by modern youth due to their reckless behavior, leave a bright black mark on their lives.

title: Henry the Dealer
overview: Maciek, Beata, Jacek and Heniek have been working together as car dealers for years. One day a policeman arrives at their workplace and inquires about Heniek, suggesting that the man leads a double life. As Heniek has just taken a few days off, his three colleagues undertake individual investigations into his real identity. Outwardly not believing in his guilt, in secret, they look for proof that Heniek is a gangster and for the loot he presumably stole. But is Heniek really a crook?

title: L'esecuzione
overview: The mother of a young careless gangster is dying. The gangster's associates, disgusted by the boy's disregard for his sick mother, leads the character into deep self reflection. These reflections, having been processed mechanically and without concern for moral, induce the simplest yet most violent of actions.

title: Burned.
overview: A young man finds himself in a life of crime.
tagline: They raised him from birth- but they're not his family...

title: Stranger
overview: In a romanticized view of old Las Vegas under mafia control, Stranger, the city's best hit man let a target go and must accept the consequence. Being a man of principle he waits for his death and contemplates if his current set of rules will be worth dying for.

title: Origin
overview: The story begins when two young men from Erdenet enter the city to change their lives. The city welcomes them better than they could have imagined. But in the end, everything goes wrong and they find out who they are in this life. The film conveys the meaning that people will receive the consequences of their actions, whether they like it or not.

title: The Shave
overview: Slutever's a long-time advocate of the bush -- it's classy! -- but, sometimes you have to shave it off as a reminder why you like it so much.

title: Den Oschysste Mannen som sköt John F. Kennedy
Jan Olsson's Record Store
overview: Jan Olsson is exposed to an attempted robbery in his record store, which has disastrous consequences for him.

title: The Fists of Righteous Harmony
overview: A group of centuries-old crime fighters known as the FISTS become modern day motorcycle riding superheroes by using spectecular ninja techniques to battle the forces of evil. The Dark Monk (their arch nemesis) has resurfaced from the criminal underground to wreak havoc on the lives of the innocent and eliminate the Fists beginning with Syko, whose psychic abilities enable the Fists to see crime before it happens. The Police are distrustful of the ways of the Fists and vow to stop them, suspecting that they are not gud, but instead evil masked assassins, With a corrupt police force in league with the drone-like Gang of the Black Mask, and the Dark Monk bent on destroying them, can the Fists possibly survive long enough to save the world?
tagline: As long as EVIL exists, so must THE FISTS!

title: Marianna
overview: His father left him a girls name and disappeared from his life making it miserable. Everyone laughed when heard his name. Therefore Mariana promised himself never to let anyone abuse him. He ended up being a gangster, his principles kept him alive, but there comes a time when they put him in great danger.

title: Invisible Lines
overview: A terrible film about a shockingly sad story.  The honour killing of a 26 year old gay man by his father.  Wendel's writing is banal and lifeless, his direction is no better.  A young man who deserved better.............

title: Judy
overview: Karen Fields reprises her role as unhappy camper, Judy (in this short film follow-up to Sleepaway Camp and Return To Sleepaway Camp) to inflict some bloody revenge on 2 abusive parents.
tagline: Sleepaway Camp Was Only The Beginning!

title: The Fairest of Them All
overview: Sisters Carla and María Elena arrive at their grandmother's house only to find out the old woman has just passed away. Later, they learn their grandmother had two lovers, who now want to steal the girls' inheritance.

title: The Message
overview: Linus is doing a job for his boss Dante, but a mistake along the way leads to unexpected consequences.
tagline: A simple job becomes a deadly mess.

title: Murderabilia
overview: Murderabilia is a grim, atmospheric film that plunges into the seedy underbelly of a profoundly macabre market--the buying and selling of murder-related collectibles. The film follows a compulsive collector as he tracks down a specific artifact that was involved in the brutal murder of a young woman. The journey leads him to a reclusive online vendor--a man whose unexpected offer forces the collector to confront the nature of his obsession.

title: The Trip
overview: Together with another man, the a young Vietnamese Hung is trafficked abroad on the promise of a job and a new life. Forced to work in a cannabis factory upon arrival, he becomes a prisoner in a new world. Based on a real life case study and Winner of the Unchosen Film Campaign Against Human Trafficking.

title: You Have Won $9M!
overview: Documentary about the Internet scams and emails which claim that we have won millions of dollars in online lotteries.

title: Animalario
overview: Dr. EGO's abominable genetic experiments have broken the tranquility of Animalario, a city now on the verge of chaos. GATTO, an experienced detective has not ceased in his quest to stop EGO and restore order, but this time, a deadly HIENA will do everything in her power to stand in his way.

title: All Mortal Flesh
overview: A contract killer reluctantly accepts a last minute assignment in the run-up to Christmas. The routine job takes an unexpected turn, and he finds himself morally and emotionally challenged.

title: Tobin: Portrait of a Serial Killer
overview: As serial killer Peter Tobin awaits his third murder conviction, investigators from the British televisions series Real Crime look back at his twisted life. Deemed too dangerous to ever be released from prison, police believed theyve only begun to count his victims. Tobin himself brags of killing up to 48 people. What is the truth behind this well-dressed Killer, known as the charming psychopath?

title: Schemer
overview: Irv Saint is an undercover agent who infiltrates a fashion magazine company to spy on its owners, who are believed to be involved in Organized Crime. But as Irv gets closer to them, the risks become higher.

title: Highspeed Flamingo
overview: James Carr is a hotshot movie producer. His girlfriend Shandi is a hot commodity.  A romantic getaway, with plans of making her a star, goes awry when Shandi is kidnapped and forced into an underground adult film company called HIGHSPEED FLAMINGO, run by the eccentric Purple Hat Tom and his bumbling partner Bobby Lagoon.  Now with the assistance of a lazy bartender and sexy secret agent and rock star Genevieve Anastasio, it's life or death for James to save the day and get the girl in this lightning-paced action comedy!
tagline: A star so bright ... A love so right ... He can't screw this up!

title: A Heart Will not Stop
overview: Four young men who committed crimes for the first time are sent to the border guard for training instead of prison. They have the same love for each other, who have joined hands for the security of the homeland's borders and national security.

production_companies.name: Shanghai Xiang Sheng Film and Televison Production Distribution Co., LTD

title: Someone Has Passed Away
overview: The film is based on a story by journalist Tuyaara Sikkier. This is the story of a simple girl who moved to live in the city. She is waiting for a difficult test, a meeting with a loved one and his loss. In the film, love, crime, the search for the meaning of life.

title: Paat
overview: After his owner dies, a dog wander alone in Tehran, following people and their stories.

title: Bloody Eyes
overview: A woman kills with her eyes and protects herself with dark sunglasses. She suffers with her condition and roams the city looking for love.

title: Natural Life
overview: Natural Life tells the stories of 5 youths who received the most severe sentence available for convicted adults - a sentence of life without parole (natural life). The youthful status and/or lesser culpability of these youths, their background and the circumstances leading to their crime, as well as their potential for rehabilitation, were not taken into account at any point in the charging and sentencing process. The five will never be evaluated for change, difference or growth. They will remain in prison till they die.

title: Krimi unter Teck - Spur in die Vergangenheit
Sounds terrible and echoes
overview: A badly recorded story that we don't really know how to fix. Be careful, the rest of you, with the mistakes, because then the critics will eat you like piranhas.

title: 4,9 g de cyanure, l'affaire de la Josacine
Day of Fury
overview: The decisions of six individuals collide during a day out of control, where they seek to change what seems inevitable. Michael gets into serious trouble when he has to settle a debt with Tony, a peculiar criminal. Rafael fulfills his dream of being a cop, but discovers that the job also involves testing his ideals. Manuel and Arthur are two students who discover that the way to make easy money does not always Java a point of return. Sergio carries the weight of the death of his brother and has to face his fears when an intruder threatens his family.

title: Meet the Grimswalls
overview: What do you do when you are two young hot transgenders with nothing to do on Halloween? You accepted an initiation to a private swingers ball. Clad only in lingerie eight strangers gather for a nightt of sex, drugs, booze and of course murder. Unknown to the attendees their separate fates are all entwined when more than one serial killer stalks the errie halls looking for bloody revenge.

title: SmokeCity: Bloodland
overview: Two petty criminals never would have guessed who is really behind the crime they had just committed, a discovery which comes with deadly consequences.

title: Mr. Right
overview: Wendy is on the rebound after a messy divorce. She is finally at a place in her life were she realizes that before she can fall in love, she must first love herself. But they say that here in Alaska 'The odds are good but the goods are odd.'.

title: EXHIBIT X
overview: A party held in one of the most haunted houses in the country as a publicity stunt to launch a new liquor company ended with 51 people dead. The police arrived on the scene to find the house on fire. They managed to rescue one person from the blaze, a beautiful model from New York who is not the prime suspect in the murder trial. A camera containing footage from that night was also found in the house and delivered to investigators. This is the restricted footage leaked by a jury member in one of the most infamous murder trials in US history and the first of its kind of include paranormal evidence.

title: BEANS
overview: A bean loving kid's breakfast is sabotaged by a bean hater, who uses fart powder to make our protagonist fart uncontrollably, which has devastating consequences for the people around him.
tagline: A tale of warning against the over consumption of beans

title: Thieves
overview: Two men decide to rob the wrong people. One is in Miami the other one is in L.A. and they are both on the run. Will they survive?

title: El corrido del 8
overview: Pedro "el 8" has his family killed by an opposing drug cartel. He recruits men to hunt the killers and kill them.

title: Deal with it
overview: Shamira Raphaela (30) travels the world as a TV director. Her life is in sharp contrast with that of her father and brother, who are both in and out of jail. In this intimate family portrait, we enter the chaotic and colorful world of Shamira's father Pempy, a drug dealing addict, and her brother Andy, who's following in his fathers footsteps. They both counter their seemingly desperate lives with lots of resilience and humor. Simultaneously, it's impossible for Shamira to remain unaffected by the vicious circle trapping her father and brother. A film about destructive family patterns and unconditional love.

title: My Brother is a Chieftain
overview: It was a rainy night. Khangai, taking his younger brother with him, ran away from someone and begged a family to adopt him, but the parents refused to let him. But Amraa begged until the end, kneeling down and begging for his life, and finally, as she had planned, she left her younger brother with a completely unknown family. The film begins with the complicated fate of the two siblings. 20 years later, Khangai searched for his younger brother, but his younger brother had disappeared.

title: Hakeldama
overview: Three bandits decide to hide in a remote cabin, but soon fear and suspicions will grow between them.

title: Vollmond
overview: The body of a homeless man is found in the middle of the city. After the examination by the forensic doctors, it is found that the man has not a drop of blood left in his body. In addition, two strange stigmata adorn his neck. Inspector Rabe and his colleague/partner Susi Müller are faced with a mystery. Their boss is on a commissariat leader training course and they are to solve the case alone. Private detective Axel Strick, on the other hand, is called in by the fortress administration: A grave and an open, empty coffin have been discovered in an old battlements. Stick is to proceed discreetly and find out what the part is all about. Of course, the cases of the two unequal friends Rabe and Stick become entangled in a few too many drinks, and the viewer is allowed to dive into a world full of night creatures, student fraternities and other mysterious deaths ...
tagline: Rabe and Strick against the vampire!

title: Stable House
overview: After the tragic death of his wife in a horse riding accident, a young man begins to lose his sanity, haunted by visions of her that may only be in his troubled mind or a visit from beyond the grave... As a close friend (the Horse Trainer) tries to help the grieving husband, he discovers a passionate love affair was just beginning between his deceased wife and this man... The Husband plans an evening of revenge but the apparition of the wife sends everything into chaos.

title: Mr. Wrong Number
overview: Jacky is a young man against whom the police have issued a lookout notice in connection with the murder of an eight-year-old girl. But the police are unable to get any details about Jacky. Their investigation reaches three women who Jacky blackmailed. The police collect information from them. Meanwhile, it is found that Jacky is blackmailing a 50-year-old homosexual man. Finally, Jacky is caught by the police. But there unwraps many unexpected truths to the surprise of all.

title: Sam
overview: Sam and his best friend realize that the games they play every day in their neighborhood suddenly turn dangerous.

title: Special Operation
overview: On Friday night, the city was in a state of uproar. The names Bayartsengel, Jargal, and Naadam seemed to be calling for a show, and the three young men called this evening a flight to the gates of heaven. However, this flight ended at 12 o'clock, and the doors of the entertainment venues and shops were closed. The three young men, who did not know what to do, met a woman who turned out to be Saikhnaa, the wife of Tamir, the owner of the distillery. So they entered the factory, and now the real trouble began.

title: Dhilakani
overview: One man's tumultuous journey to seek vengeance, his undoing and his eventual redemption from an unlikeliest of sources.

title: Abused: Breaking the Silence
overview: A group of aging former classmates begin a quest for justice when they learn from one another just how many of them had been abused as schoolboys.

title: Fonds Communs
overview: An everyday man finds himself in a tricky situation after knocking down a biker with his car, a biker who happens to carry a bag full of money.

title: OS
overview: Femme Fatale Dora leads her three partners into a warehouse where a stash of gold has been hidden. But when people start getting picked off one by one, is it the groups own treachery, or the gold's wicked guardian hunting them down?

title: The Child of the Desert
overview: An old Mexican man who lives out in the desert, alone, digging graves for the mob, comes face to face with an apparition that will change his apathy and set him on a path of redemption.
A short film by Thai director Somkid Phukphong.

title: Operation Tatar
overview: A bank employee, Taivnaa, is fired for pointing out the bank's wrongdoing. Since he can't afford medical expenses for his beloved daughter who has a serious disease, he decides to conduct "Operation Tatar" to steal the bank's black money with his three buddies: ex-boxer/ex-policeman Tulgaa; half-Russian, self-proclaimed expert driver Kolya; and geeky genius hacker Gyalbaa. At the risk of their lives, they embark on Operation Tatar!

title: Dick Spanner P.I.: The Case of the Missing Episode
overview: The opener (and only episode, later restored as a short) for an unfinished third series finds a group of detectives assembled in Paris, where they're bumped off in the manner of Agatha Christie's And Then There Were None (aka Ten Little Indians). Copyrighted in 1988, but unreleased until 2014, when it surfaced on The Lost Worlds of Gerry Anderson DVD. It was later included as a bonus feature on the 2017 Dick Spanner DVD set.
A coming of age tale about a 23 year old black man haunted by his past, searching for his future, and standing in a moment between two realities with no place to call home.

title: Mais Denso que Sangue
overview: An outsider arrives in Cabeceiras with a Taurus. He is about to meet Jesus.

title: Obelisk
overview: Philly short.

title: The New Juarez
overview: As Ciudad Juarez slowly recovers from a six year period of hyperviolence, a militant police chief stirs controversy, and wary citizens cast their hopes on a new national president. All the while, the tragic facts of the "drug war" begin to form a far more sinister picture.

title: Vandals
overview: Two misdemeanor punks hold a philosophical debate on what it means to be a rebel in front of a blank brick wall begging to be tagged. Think 'Clerks' meets puberty.

title: Jie Jin
overview: Based on true events, the movie follows the story of three low class gangsters from a small Chinese province as they travel to Shanghai to offer an unique deal to the city most powerfull mob boss Raoul Kai (Christian Kang Bachini), steal a huge amount of gold for which they have exclusive and proved intel. The deal seems too good to be true and soon Raoul finds out that the three gangsters have been sent by his long time rival uncle Tong (Shui Re) in order to destabilize his organization from the inside and finally kill him. With no one left to trust Raoul must count on his own survival and strategical skills in order to save his life and protect his empire.

production_companies.name: Shanghai Zhen Fei Wenhua Chuan Bo Youxian Gong Si

title: File 25
overview: It follows the psychological battle of Jamie's journey through the criminal justice system. He is accused of a murder he claims he didn't commit. Rosie (his girlfriend) has a test of her trust in him, how long can she last before she turns against him? The media already blame him for the murder, his mum considers him a disowned child and best friend Dan believes he's guilty. Do you think he's guilty?
tagline: One teenagers psychological journey through the criminal justice system of Britain

title: The Pink Pyjama Girl
overview: A dark comedy centering on a bargain basement, suburban contract killer who has long since lost any interest in his work. Brutal, careless methods and blasé attitude to murder come back to haunt him when he's faced with the consequences of his actions and an unusual request.
tagline: Official entry to the Cinéfondation Section, Cannes Film Festival '11, France.

title: Tough Choices of Romeo
overview: Two friends, spinning in the criminal world and constantly finding themselves in dangerous situations, kidnap the daughter of a dangerous person in order to obtain a ransom.

title: Lorenzo Delgado, Private Investigator
overview: Lorenzo Delgado is a former police officer who, after being fired, becomes a private investigator, the tough kind straight out of film noir. He dresses in a suit, uses a magnifying glass, and smokes cigarettes like there's no tomorrow. He hates chases, doesn't trust cops or butlers, and is convinced that the world needs an iron hand to deliver justice—he thinks of himself as that hand. Lorenzo is being stalked by an organization conspiring against him while he tries to solve his cases.

title: Mutual Admiration Society
overview: Surreal and mysterious, in equal parts absurd and intense, Mutual Admiration Society is part of the noted multi-film collaboration between actor James Devereaux and experimental filmmaker Rouzbeh Rashidi. Based entirely around a silent, tour-de-force one-man performance by Devereaux as a man who appears to be haunting and threatening himself, Mutual Admiration Society uses startling visual techniques and editing rhythms to create a claustrophobic hall of mirrors with Devereaux’s tormented protagonist at its centre.

title: Wrong
overview: Two mates walk past a carpark when they witness a potential violation of a women. Lucky for her there hunch was right.
